trans-unit.source: How do you want numbers to be presented.
trans-unit.target: How do you want numbers to be presented.

trans-unit.source: Enables automatic checking for available updates.
trans-unit.target: Enables automatic checking for available updates.

trans-unit.source: Sets the preferred font size for the different views.
trans-unit.target: Sets the preferred font size for the different views.

trans-unit.source: Overall setting for Hiding Zero Balances. In the overview itself this can be turned ON or OFF, temporarily.
trans-unit.target: Overall setting for Hiding Zero Balances. In the overview itself this can be turned ON or OFF, temporarily.

trans-unit.source: By default, scroll bars become visible and expand when the pointer enters the area. Set this to ON to have always a clear view if a list contain more items or not.
trans-unit.target: By default, scroll bars become visible and expand when the pointer enters the area. Set this to ON to have always a clear view if a list contain more items or not.

trans-unit.source: Assets are the crypto currencies that you have in portfolio at one or more accounts. Crypto of your interest need to be added first to the Coin Library. Also one or more accounts need to be configured. Build up your assets by adding transactions using the 'Add Transaction' button at the bottom of this window.
trans-unit.target: Assets are the crypto currencies that you have in portfolio at one or more accounts. Crypto of your interest need to be added first to the Coin Library. Also one or more accounts need to be configured. Build up your assets by adding transactions using the 'Add Transaction' button at the bottom of this window.

trans-unit.source: The Accounts list gives you an overview of locations where you have your crypto assets in custody.
trans-unit.target: The Accounts list gives you an overview of locations where you have your crypto assets in custody.

trans-unit.source: The Narratives view gives you an overview of your crypto assets in relation to their narrative. Go to the Library View to assign a Narrative to a coin that is already in the Library. When you add e new coin then a narrative can be assigned right away. The app comes with an initial Narrative List that can be modified. The Name and Description can be changed and also new Narratives can be added.
trans-unit.target: The Narratives view gives you an overview of your crypto assets in relation to their narrative. Go to the Library View to assign a Narrative to a coin that is already in the Library. When you add e new coin then a narrative can be assigned right away. The app comes with an initial Narrative List that can be modified. The Name and Description can be changed and also new Narratives can be added.

trans-unit.source: The Library is a collection of crypto coins that you are interested in. So you won't be distracted or disturbed by the large amount of unimportant coins out there. The coins in the library can be used to build your portfolio.
trans-unit.target: The Library is a collection of crypto coins that you are interested in. So you won't be distracted or disturbed by the large amount of unimportant coins out there. The coins in the library can be used to build your portfolio.

trans-unit.source: A Buy is a conversion from a StableCoin to a Non-StableCoin and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.
trans-unit.target: A Buy is a conversion from a StableCoin to a Non-StableCoin and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.

trans-unit.source: A Convert is a conversion from Coin_A to Coin_B and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.
trans-unit.target: A Convert is a conversion from Coin_A to Coin_B and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.

trans-unit.source: A Deposit is a transaction where 'new' crypto flows into your portfolio. The source could be any fiat bank account, but will not be registered. Only the receiving Account is registered.
trans-unit.target: A Deposit is a transaction where 'new' crypto flows into your portfolio. The source could be any fiat bank account, but will not be registered. Only the receiving Account is registered.

trans-unit.source: A Sell is a conversion from a Non-StableCoin to a StableCoin and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.
trans-unit.target: A Sell is a conversion from a Non-StableCoin to a StableCoin and can be combined with a Transfer from accounts.

trans-unit.source: A Transfer is a 'transaction' where crypto moves from one account to another.
trans-unit.target: A Transfer is a 'transaction' where crypto moves from one account to another.

trans-unit.source: A Withdraw is a transaction where crypto flows out of your portfolio. The destination could be any fiat bank account.
trans-unit.target: A Withdraw is a transaction where crypto flows out of your portfolio. The destination could be any fiat bank account.

trans-unit.source: * Be patient - busy at CoinGecko API at the moment.
trans-unit.target: * Be patient - busy at CoinGecko API at the moment.

trans-unit.source: e.g. this is the place to put a note....
trans-unit.target: e.g. this is the place to put a note....

trans-unit.source: Please Confirm to delete and revert this transaction
trans-unit.target: Please Confirm to delete and revert this transaction

trans-unit.source: The setup file has been saved in your Downloads folder. Click 'Install' to proceed with th einstallation. The application will be closed automatically.
trans-unit.target: The setup file has been saved in your Downloads folder. Click 'Install' to proceed with th einstallation. The application will be closed automatically.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to download it? In the meanwhile you can continue using the app. You will be notified when the download has finished.
trans-unit.target: Do you want to download it? In the meanwhile you can continue using the app. You will be notified when the download has finished.

trans-unit.source: The Narrative is assigned to one or more assets.
trans-unit.target: The Narrative is assigned to one or more assets.

trans-unit.target: Select Dark or Light color theme for the application.

trans-unit.source: Select the language you prefer for this app.
trans-unit.target: Select the language you prefer for this app.

trans-unit.target: Search coin using name, symbol, id

trans-unit.target: Adding coin to the Library failed

trans-unit.target: Mandatory Coin data missing (Id/Name/Symbol). Coin will NOT be added to the Coin Library

trans-unit.source: Determine if you want to have the Inflow and Outflow information shown on the Portfolio View.
trans-unit.target: Determine if you want to have the Inflow and Outflow information shown on the Portfolio View.

trans-unit.source: Capital Inflow based on sum of all Deposits
trans-unit.target: Capital Inflow based on sum of all Deposits

trans-unit.source: Capital Outflow based on sum of all Withdraws
trans-unit.target: Capital Outflow based on sum of all Withdraws

trans-unit.source: e.g. Coin listing expected to be in Q1 2025
trans-unit.target: e.g. Coin listing expected to be in Q1 2025

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a new coin you have invested in, is not yet listed at data aggregators like CoinGecko. In this case you can add a pre-listing coin here. In a later stage, when the coin becomes listed, you can 'merge' this coin with the listed one. See the 'merge' action at the three dots ...
trans-unit.target: Sometimes a new coin you have invested in, is not yet listed at data aggregators like CoinGecko. In this case you can add a pre-listing coin here. In a later stage, when the coin becomes listed, you can 'merge' this coin with the listed one. See the 'merge' action at the three dots ...

trans-unit.source: Unable to open the Online Help file in your default browser.
trans-unit.target: Unable to open the Online Help file in your default browser.

trans-unit.source: This app is retrieving its data using the public API provided by CoinGecko, a Crypto market data aggregator.
trans-unit.target: This app is retrieving its data using the public API provided by CoinGecko, a Crypto market data aggregator.

trans-unit.source: CoinGecko’s Public API has a rate limit of 5 to 15 calls per minute, depending on usage conditions worldwide. Most of the time it turns out to be around 5 requests per minute. When a 'Too Many Requests' occurs then a 30 seconds timeout is build in before re-trying the request.
trans-unit.target: CoinGecko’s Public API has a rate limit of 5 to 15 calls per minute, depending on usage conditions worldwide. Most of the time it turns out to be around 5 requests per minute. When a 'Too Many Requests' occurs then a 30 seconds timeout is build in before re-trying the request.

trans-unit.source: The navigation menu on the left has an 'Help' option which opens a PDF document in your browser. This document is updated regularly, if needed.
trans-unit.target: The navigation menu on the left has an 'Help' option which opens a PDF document in your browser. This document is updated regularly, if needed.

trans-unit.source: Need for additional support or do you have a question, comment or request? Please feel free to send me an email (
trans-unit.target: Need for additional support or do you have a question, comment or request? Please feel free to send me an email (

trans-unit.target: If you find this app valuable and would like to support further development, you can make a donation to one of the following addresses:

trans-unit.source: This overview gives an indication if the actual price of a coin is within range of a specified level. The levels that can be set are, a Take Profit, a buy and a Stop level. If the price is within range of a level it will be indicated by a colour.
trans-unit.target: This overview gives an indication if the actual price of a coin is within range of a specified level. The levels that can be set are, a Take Profit, a buy and a Stop level. If the price is within range of a level it will be indicated by a colour.

trans-unit.source: Expand this to get access to settings related to the 'Assets View' like HideCapitalFlow, HideZeroBalances
trans-unit.target: Expand this to get access to settings related to the 'Assets View' like HideCapitalFlow, HideZeroBalances

trans-unit.source: Expand this to get access to general settings like NumberFormat, FontSize, Language, Dark/Light theme, ExpandedScrollBars
trans-unit.target: Expand this to get access to general settings like NumberFormat, FontSize, Language, Dark/Light theme, ExpandedScrollBars

trans-unit.source: Expand this to get acces to settings related to the 'Price Level' feature like WithinRangePerc and CloseToPerc.
trans-unit.target: Expand this to get acces to settings related to the 'Price Level' feature like WithinRangePerc and CloseToPerc.

trans-unit.source: This threshold is used to provide a visual confirmation of the Actual Price being within the range of it's target level.
trans-unit.target: This threshold is used to provide a visual confirmation of the Actual Price being within the range of it's target level.

trans-unit.source: This threshold is used to provide a visual confirmation of the Actual Price being within close range of it's target level.
trans-unit.target: This threshold is used to provide a visual confirmation of the Actual Price being within close range of it's target level.

trans-unit.source: Expand this to get access to settings related to the Dasboard View
trans-unit.target: Expand this to get access to settings related to the Dasboard View

trans-unit.source: The number of coins visible in the Portfolio Pie. The remaining coins will be grouped into 'Others'
trans-unit.target: The number of coins visible in the Portfolio Pie. The remaining coins will be grouped into 'Others'

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of coins in the Portfolio Pie Chart
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of coins in the Portfolio Pie Chart

trans-unit.source: Go to the 'Price Levels' view to set target levels.
trans-unit.target: Go to the 'Price Levels' view to set target levels.

trans-unit.source: a Narrative with this name already exists
trans-unit.target: a Narrative with this name already exists

trans-unit.source: an Account with this name already exists
trans-unit.target: an Account with this name already exists

trans-unit.source: Assign a main Narrative to each of your coins to get a Narrative View. Assigning can be done at the Library for already existing coins or when adding a new coin.
trans-unit.target: Assign a main Narrative to each of your coins to get a Narrative View. Assigning can be done at the Library for already existing coins or when adding a new coin.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Build up your Portfolio by adding Transactions in the Assets View
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Build up your Portfolio by adding Transactions in the Assets View

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Add Accounts. An Account is a location where you hold your coins, like Bybit, MEXC, Ledger, Trezor or any other exchange or wallet
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Add Accounts. An Account is a location where you hold your coins, like Bybit, MEXC, Ledger, Trezor or any other exchange or wallet

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Add coins to your Library.
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Add coins to your Library.

trans-unit.source: Assign a main Narrative to each of your coins to get a Narrative Distribution. Assigning can be done at the Library for already existing coins or when adding a new coin
trans-unit.target: Assign a main Narrative to each of your coins to get a Narrative Distribution. Assigning can be done at the Library for already existing coins or when adding a new coin

trans-unit.source: Set Maximum Number of visible coins in 'Settings -> Dashboard Settings'. The remaining coins will be grouped into 'Others'
trans-unit.target: Set Maximum Number of visible coins in 'Settings -> Dashboard Settings'. The remaining coins will be grouped into 'Others'

trans-unit.source: Click on a Narrative in the list to expand and show the related coins
trans-unit.target: Click on a Narrative in the list to expand and show the related coins

trans-unit.source: First you have to assign a Narrative to each of the coins. You can do that in the Library
trans-unit.target: First you have to assign a Narrative to each of the coins. You can do that in the Library

trans-unit.source: Assigning Narratives can be done for existing coins by selecting the action dots ... on the right of each coin
trans-unit.target: Assigning Narratives can be done for existing coins by selecting the action dots ... on the right of each coin
